Utility Functions¶

Utility functions are a set of MLI APIs that facilitate the interface between MLI kernels and the user code. Operations in this set are not directly involved in graph calculations and are instead used to prepare data for MLI processing or to get information encoded in the MLI interface.

  • Data Conversion Group
    • Description
    • Functions
    • Conditions
    • Result
  • Helper Functions Group
    • Get Element Size
    • Count Number of Elements
    • Get Scale Value
    • Get Scale Shift Value
    • Get Zero Offset Value
    • Create Subtensor
    • Get Number of Accumulator Guard Bits
